content.rendered:
Directed by M. Padmakumar

Written by John Mahendran

Star Bhanu. Sudha Chandran. Charukesh. Aarti Desai (Mother of bride). Aarti Ganesh. Munish Shiva Gurunath. Ilavarasu. Jayaprakash (Kutti). Shamna Kasim. Vetri Kiran (SP). Kumar. Mani Kutty. Santhana Lakshmi. Mani. G. Marimuthu. Raj Mariyan. George Maryan. Mani Megalai. Mimmo (Traffic Sub Inspector). Anil Murali. Bagavathi Perumal. Priya. Karna Raja. Apollo Ravi. Pandi Ravi. Saami. Sangeetha. Madhu Shalini. R.K. Suresh. Sangeetha Venkatesh (Doctor). Ravi Venkatraman

Language Tamil

Producers Bala

Production B Studios. Shark9 Pictures
